c:simple-property.name: installationPath
c:simple-property.description: Directory in which the Tomcat instance is installed.

c:simple-property.name: jmxUrl
c:simple-property.description: URL for JMX communication. Protocol, host, port are required.

c:simple-property.name: startScript
c:simple-property.description: The path to the script or executable used to start this instance (e.g. <install-home>/bin/startup.sh); if the path is not absolute, then it will be resolved relative to the installation directory (i.e. the 'Installation Path' connection property).

c:simple-property.name: shutdownScript
c:simple-property.description: The path to the script or executable used to stop this instance (e.g. <install-home>/bin/shutdown.sh); if the path is not absolute, then it will be resolved relative to the installation directory (i.e. the 'Installation Path' connection property).
